name: cert-warden
description: Certwarden is a self-hosted certificate management tool designed to simplify issuing and renewing Let's Encrypt certificates. It provides a web dashboard to manage certs and integrates with ACME challenges and DNS services.

features.title: Certificate Management
features.description: Simplify SSL/TLS certificate lifecycle. Easy management

features.title: Let's Encrypt
features.description: Automatic certificate issuance and renewal. Free SSL

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Manage all certificates from browser interface. Visual control

features.title: Acme Integration
features.description: Support for ACME challenges and DNS validation. Flexible verification

features.title: Renewal Automation
features.description: Never worry about expired certificates. Set and forget

features.title: Multi
features.description: Manage certificates for multiple domains. Centralized management

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep certificate management in-house. Security control
